remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a continuous function from topology ` J ` to topology ` K ` ."  Definition of continuous function in [Munkres] p. 102.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
iscn.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
iscn.2 $e |- Y = U. K $.
iscn2 $p |- ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> ( ( J e. Top /\ K e. Top ) /\ ( F : X --> Y /\ A. y e. K ( `' F " y ) e. J ) ) ) $.
$d F y $.
$d J y $.
$d K y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y y $.
